title: 03. Mardonius’ Invasion
description: Herodotus’ account of the Persian expedition to Greece led by Mardonius.

options: Punish Eritrea and Athens, and subdue as many Greek cities as possible.
Secure Persian dominance in the Aegean region.
Conquer all of Greece and spread Persian culture.
Seek revenge for the Persian defeat at Marathon.

He fortified the region for future invasions.
